subject: Fluxbox
body:
I've noted that there are packaged versions of
Blackbox and hackedbox available from FreshRPMs. What
about FluxBox? 
I'd certainly enjoy a packaged version, since its
creators seem hesitant to provide .rpms (.debs, yes,
but no .rpms).
.Doug
